Package org.forgerock.openidm.servletregistration.impl

Class ServletRegistrationSingleton

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.servletregistration.impl.ServletRegistrationSingleton
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServletRegistration
public class ServletRegistrationSingleton extends Object implements ServletRegistration
Takes configuration to register and de-register configured servlet filters, with support to load the filter or supporting classes off a defined class path

  • Field Summary

    • registerServlet

      public void registerServlet(String alias, jakarta.servlet.Servlet servlet, Dictionary initparams) throws jakarta.servlet.ServletException, org.ops4j.pax.web.service.http.NamespaceException
      Registers a servlet in OSGI
      Specified by:
      registerServlet in interface ServletRegistration
      Parameters:
      alias - name in the URI namespace at which the servlet is registered
      servlet - the servlet object to register
      initparams - initialization arguments for the servlet or null if there are none. This argument is used by the servlet's ServletConfig object.
      Throws:
      jakarta.servlet.ServletException
      org.ops4j.pax.web.service.http.NamespaceException

      Parameters:
